content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata record="2588"><idinfo><citation><citeinfo><origin role="Author">Adleman, Jennifer N.</origin><title>Alaska volcanoes guidebook for teachers</title><pubdate>2011</pubdate><serinfo><sername>General Information Product</sername><issue>99</issue></serinfo><pubinfo><publish>U.S. Geological Survey</publish></pubinfo><onlink>http://pubs.usgs.gov/gip/99/</onlink></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>The lessons and activities in this guidebook are meant to supplement and enhance existing science content already being taught to Alaskan students in grade levels 6-12.</abstract></descript><accconst>none</accconst><useconst>none</useconst><keywords><theme><themekt>Alexandria Digital Library Feature Type Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>volcanoes</themekey></theme><place><placekt>Common geographic areas</placekt><placekey>fUS02 = Alaska</placekey></place><theme><themekt>USGS Thesaurus</themekt><themekey>K-12 resources</themekey><themekey>hazard preparedness</themekey><themekey>hazards</themekey><themekey>tectonic processes</themekey><themekey>volcanic activity</themekey></theme></keywords></idinfo><metainfo><metd>20120904</metd><metc><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>Allwardt, Alan </cntper><cntorg>USGS WR SW GD</cntorg></cntperp><cntaddr><addrtype>mailing address</addrtype><address>400 Natural Bridges Drive</address><city>Santa Cruz</city><state>CA</state><postal>95060</postal><country>USA</country></cntaddr><cntvoice>831-427-4751</cntvoice><cntemail>aallwardt@usgs.gov</cntemail></cntinfo></metc><metstdn>Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn><metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv></metainfo></metadata>
